page.title: 20Sawston in the future.
page.content:
Children's ideas about the likely life style in 2085
{Schools} No school- programmed learning at birth. Learning at home or school by computer, mornings only. {Sawston} Bigger. Taller buildings of glass or plastic _ adaptable shape. Solar heating. 'Copter pad on roof. Village domed for protection. {Transport} Computerized cars and trains. Free transport. Amphibious cars. Domed shaped transporters travelling on a cushion of air. {Food }Balanced diet in tablet form. {Homes} Computer operated doors,lights etc. Robots to help with chores. Shopping by computer. Telephones with a visual link. {Clothes} All-in-one suits.Mini skirts. very bright colours. {Wars }No wars!
